email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Dear Linda, We are looking to ship 12,000MT of steel coils from Busan to Los Angeles in November. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability? Best regards, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Hi Alex, Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 85,000, LOA 220m, with a laycan of Nov 15-20. The starting freight rate is $85/MT on a CFR basis. Please let me know if this works for you. Best, Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Hi Linda, Thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high. Could you consider $78/MT? Best, Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Hi Alex, After reviewing, we can offer $80/MT, which includes all standard port charges and handling. The demurrage rate is $10,000/day. Please confirm if this is acceptable. Best, Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body: Hi Linda, $80/MT works for us. Please proceed with the booking and send us the recap. Best, Alex

email_chain.subject: Recap: Steel Coils Shipment from Busan to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex, Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Cargo Size: 12,000MT
- Load Port: Busan
- Discharge Port: Los Angeles
- Freight Rate: $80/MT CFR
- Laycan: Nov 15-20
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Please confirm if everything is correct. Best, Linda
